alert.note: Alert for Coastal Rockingham; Eastern Hillsborough; Interior Rockingham; Strafford; Western And Central Hillsborough (New Hampshire) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 04 at 9:15AM EST by NWS Gray/Portland
info.description: ...An band of heavy snow will affect southwestern Kennebec...York... Androscoggin...Cumberland...Sagadahoc...Rockingham...Strafford and southeastern Hillsborough Counties... At 913 AM EST...An band of heavy snow was developing along a line extending from near Lewiston to Seabrook...and moving northeast AT 10 MPH. Locations impacted include... Nashua, Portland, Lewiston, Derry, Rochester, South Portland, Auburn, Biddeford, Portsmouth, Brunswick, Westbrook, Hampton, Exeter, Kittery, Bath, Gardiner, Mechanic Falls, Alfred, Sanford and Naples. This includes the following highways... Interstate 295 between mile markers 1 and 51. Interstate 93 between mile markers 2 and 17. Interstate 95 between mile markers 1 and 103. Interstate 95 in New Hampshire between mile markers 1 and 16. This also includes... Sebago Lake, York Beach, Ogunquit Beach, Wells Beach, and Higgins Beach. Peaks Island, Long Island, Cushing Island, Cousins Island, and Bailey Island. * Visibilities will drop quickly to less than a quarter mile in this area of heavy snow. * Snowfall rates of 1 to 2 inches per hour are occurring in this area of heavy snow. Conditions can deteriorate rapidly in winter weather situations. Be prepared for snow or ice covered roads, especially in areas where roads were previously just wet or slushy. Slow down and allow extra time when traveling.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Rockingham; Eastern Hillsborough; Interior Rockingham; Strafford; Western And Central Hillsborough
